Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Experiencing Delays; Boarding change at Fullerton
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line service running w/delays; board all 95th-bound Red Line trains on the Loop-bound Brown Line side or the platform at Fullerton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line service running w/delays; board all 95th-bound Red Line trains on the Loop-bound Brown Line side or the platform at Fullerton.

We're working to restore normal service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
